card.name: Jinzo
card.description: Trap Cards, and their effects on the field, cannot be activated. Negate all Trap effects on the field.

card.name: Steel Ogre Grotto #2
card.description: A mechanized iron doll with tremendous strength.

card.name: Three-Headed Geedo
card.description: A three-headed nocturnal monster that is absolutely ruthless when fighting.

card.name: Parasite Paracide
card.description: FLIP: Put this card face-up in your opponent's Deck and shuffle it. When your opponent draws this card, it is Special Summoned to their side of the field in face-up Defense Position, and inflicts 1000 damage to them. Then, while this card is face-up on the field, all monsters your opponent controls become Insect-Type monsters.

card.name: 7 Completed
card.description: Activate this card by choosing ATK or DEF; equip only to a Machine monster. It gains 700 ATK or DEF, depending on the choice.

card.name: Lightforce Sword
card.description: Banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand, face-down. During your opponent's 4th Standby Phase after this card's activation, return that card to their hand.

card.name: Chain Destruction
card.description: When a monster(s) with 2000 or less ATK is Summoned: Target 1 of them; destroy all cards with that name in its controller's hand and Main Deck.

card.name: Time Seal
card.description: Skip the Draw Phase of your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Graverobber
card.description: Select 1 Spell Card from your opponent's Graveyard. You can use it as your hand until the end of the turn. If you use it, you take 2000 points of damage.

card.name: Gift of The Mystical Elf
card.description: Increase your Life Points by 300 points for each monster on the field.

card.name: The Eye of Truth
card.description: Your opponent must keep their hand revealed. Once per turn, during your opponent's Standby Phase, if they have a Spell(s) in their hand: They gain 1000 LP if they have a Spell(s) in their hand at resolution.

card.name: Dust Tornado
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

card.name: Call of the Haunted
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Solomon's Lawbook
card.description: Skip your own Standby Phase.

card.name: Earthshaker
card.description: Select 2 Monster Card Attributes. Your opponent then selects 1 of the 2 Attributes and destroys all face-up monsters with that Attribute on the field.

card.name: Enchanted Javelin
card.description: Increase your Life Points by the ATK of 1 attacking monster.

card.name: Mirror Wall
card.description: Each of your opponent's monsters that conducted an attack while this card was face-up on the field has its ATK halved as long as this card remains on the field. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 2000 LP or destroy this card.

card.name: Gust
card.description: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your Spell Cards are destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard by a card effect your opponent controls. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

card.name: Driving Snow
card.description: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your Trap Cards are destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard by a card effect your opponent controls. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

card.name: Armored Glass
card.description: You can activate this card when a monster is equipped with an Equip Card. Negate the effects of all Equip Cards on the field during the turn this card is activated.

card.name: World Suppression
card.description: You can activate this card when a Field Spell Card is activated. Negate the Field Spell Card during the turn this card is activated.

card.name: Mystic Probe
card.description: You can activate this card when a Continuous Spell Card is activated. Negate all Continuous Spell Cards during the turn this card is activated.

card.name: Metal Detector
card.description: You can activate this card when a Continuous Trap Card is activated. Negate all Continuous Trap Cards during the turn this card is activated.

card.name: Numinous Healer
card.description: You can only activate this card when you take damage to your Life Points. Increase your Life Points by 1000 points. Also, increase your Life Points by 500 points for each "Numinous Healer" card in your Graveyard.

card.name: Appropriate
card.description: Activate only when your opponent draws a card(s), except during their Draw Phase. Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Forced Requisition
card.description: You can activate this card when you discard from your hand. After that, each time you discard from your hand, your opponent must also discard the same number of cards from his/her hand.

card.name: DNA Surgery
card.description: Activate this card by declaring 1 Monster Type. All face-up monsters on the field become that Type.

card.name: The Regulation of Tribe
card.description: Select 1 Type of monster. Any monster of the selected Type cannot attack. To keep this card in effect, you must offer 1 monster from the field as a Tribute at each of your Standby Phases. If you cannot, this card is destroyed.

card.name: Backup Soldier
card.description: While there are 5 or more monsters in your Graveyard: Target up to 3 non-Effect Monsters with 1500 or less ATK in your Graveyard; add them to your hand.

card.name: Major Riot
card.description: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your monsters are returned from the field to your hand. Return all Monster Cards on the field to your respective hands. Both you and your opponent can then Special Summon from your hand the same number of Monster Cards on the field in face-down Defense Position.

card.name: Ceasefire
card.description: If a face-down Defense Position monster or an Effect Monster is on the field: Change all face-down Defense Position monsters on the field to face-up Defense Position (Flip monsters' effects are not activated at this time), also inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Effect Monster on the field.

card.name: Light of Intervention
card.description: While this card is on the field, Monster Cards cannot be Set or flipped face-down. If a Monster Card would be Set, it must be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position.

card.name: Respect Play
card.description: During their respective turns, each player must show their opponent their hand.

card.name: Magical Hats
card.description: During your opponent's Battle Phase: Choose 2 Spell/Trap Cards from your Deck and 1 monster in your Main Monster Zone. Special Summon them as Normal Monsters (ATK 0/DEF 0) in face-down Defense Position, Set the chosen monster if it is face-up, and shuffle them on the field. The 2 cards chosen from your Deck are destroyed at the end of the Battle Phase, and cannot remain on the field except during this Battle Phase.

card.name: Nobleman of Crossout
card.description: Target 1 face-down monster on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, banish it, then, if it was a Flip monster, each player reveals their Main Deck, then banishes all cards from it with that monster's name.

card.name: Nobleman of Extermination
card.description: Select, destroy, and remove from play 1 face-down Spell or Trap Card. If it was a Trap Card, both players must remove from play all copies of that card from their Decks.

card.name: The Shallow Grave
card.description: Each player targets 1 monster in their own GY; each player Special Summons the target from their GY in face-down Defense Position.

card.name: Premature Burial
card.description: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in Attack Position and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

card.name: Inspection
card.description: During your opponent's Standby Phase, you can randomly select 1 card in your opponent's hand and look at it at the cost of 500 Life Points.

card.name: Prohibition
card.description: Activate by declaring 1 card name. Cards with that name, and their effects, cannot be used. Cards already on the field are not affected (including face-down cards).

card.name: Morphing Jar #2
card.description: FLIP: Shuffle all monsters on the field into the Deck. Then, each player excavates cards from the top of their Deck, until they excavate the same number of monsters they shuffled into their Main Deck. Special Summon all excavated Level 4 or lower monsters in face-down Defense Position, also send the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

card.name: Flame Champion
card.description: A warrior protected by a flaming shield that nullifies any attack.

card.name: Twin-Headed Fire Dragon
card.description: Two dragons fused as one from the effects of the Big Bang.

card.name: Darkfire Soldier #1
card.description: An explosive expert from a special elite force.

card.name: Mr. Volcano
card.description: This seemingly mild-mannered creature has an extremely volatile temper.

card.name: Darkfire Soldier #2
card.description: A warrior who gained immeasurable power from the heart of a volcano.

card.name: Kiseitai
card.description: When your opponent's monster attacks this card in face-down Defense Position, this card becomes an Equip Spell Card equipped to the attacking monster (No damage calculation is conducted). During each of your opponent's Standby Phases, increase your Life Points by half of the ATK of the monster equipped with this card.

card.name: Cyber Falcon
card.description: A jet-powered hawk that travels at the speed of sound.

card.name: Flying Kamakiri #2
card.description: A flying mantis that feeds primarily on insects.

card.name: Sky Scout (Updated from: Harpie's Brother)
card.description: With eyes like a hawk and a flying speed exceeding Mach 5, this monster is a master of the sky.NoteCard Name updated from "Harpie's Brother" on April 19, 2013.

card.name: Buster Blader
card.description: Gains 500 ATK for each Dragon monster your opponent controls or is in their GY.

card.name: Michizure
card.description: When a monster is sent from the field to your GY, even during the Damage Step: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

card.name: Minor Goblin Official
card.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent's Life Points are 3000 or less. Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases.

card.name: Gamble
card.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent's hand is 6 or more cards and your hand is 2 or less. Toss a coin and call heads or tails. If you call it right, draw until your hand has 5 cards. If you call it wrong, skip your next turn.

card.name: Attack and Receive
card.description: You can only activate this card when you take damage to your Life Points. Inflict 700 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. Also, inflict 300 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each "Attack and Receive" card in your Graveyard.

card.name: Solemn Wishes
card.description: Increase your Life Points by 500 points each time you draw a card (or cards).

card.name: Skull Invitation
card.description: Each time a card(s) is sent to the Graveyard, inflict 300 damage to its owner for each card sent.

card.name: Bubonic Vermin
card.description: FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 "Bubonic Vermin" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position. Then shuffle your Deck.

card.name: Dark Bat
card.description: Bats from the netherworld that use their hyper senses to detect their enemies.

card.name: Oni Tank T-34
card.description: An armored tank possessed by a fiend that will pursue enemies until they're crushed.

card.name: Overdrive
card.description: An all-terrain armored vehicle armed with a heavy-duty machine gun.

card.name: Burning Land
card.description: When this card is activated: If there are any Field Spell Cards on the field, destroy them. During each player's Standby Phase: The turn player takes 500 damage.

card.name: Cold Wave
card.description: This card can only be activated at the start of Main Phase 1. Until your next turn, you and your opponent cannot play or Set any Spell or Trap Cards.

card.name: Fairy Meteor Crush
card.description: If the equipped monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

card.name: Limiter Removal
card.description: Double the ATK of all Machine monsters you currently control, until the end of this turn. During the End Phase of this turn, destroy those monsters.

card.name: Rain of Mercy
card.description: Increase the Life Points of both players by 1000 points.

card.name: Monster Recovery
card.description: Target 1 monster you control that is owned by you; if that monster is still on the field, shuffle it and your entire hand into the Deck, also, after that, draw cards equal to the number of cards you shuffled from your hand into the Deck by this effect. (You cannot activate this card if you have a card in your hand that is owned by your opponent.)

card.name: Shift
card.description: When your opponent targets exactly 1 monster you control (and no other cards) for an attack, or with a Spell/Trap effect: Target another monster you control that would be an appropriate target; that attack/Spell/Trap now targets the new target.

card.name: Insect Imitation
card.description: Tribute 1 monster. Special Summon 1 Insect-Type monster from your Deck whose Level is 1 higher than the Tributed monster's.

card.name: Dimensionhole
card.description: Select 1 monster on your side of the field and remove it from play until your next Standby Phase. While the monster is removed from play, the Monster Card Zone of the selected monster cannot be used.

card.name: Ground Collapse
card.description: Select 2 Main Monster Zones on the field. Neither player can use the selected zones. You cannot select a zone that is occupied by a Monster Card.

card.name: Magic Drain
card.description: When your opponent activates a Spell Card: They can discard 1 Spell Card to negate this card's effect, otherwise negate the activation of their Spell Card, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Infinite Dismissal
card.description: Level 3 or lower monsters are destroyed during the End Phase of the turn that they are Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned.

card.name: Gravity Bind
card.description: Level 4 or higher monsters cannot attack.

card.name: Type Zero Magic Crusher
card.description: Discard 1 Spell Card from your hand to inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

card.name: Shadow of Eyes
card.description: When a monster(s) is Set on your opponent's field: Target 1 of those Set monsters; change that Set monster to face-up Attack Position. (Flip Effects are not activated.)

card.name: The Legendary Fisherman
card.description: While "Umi" is on the field, this card is unaffected by Spell effects and cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.

card.name: Sword Hunter
card.description: At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card destroyed a monster(s) by battle and sent it to the Graveyard this Battle Phase: Equip all those monsters from the Graveyard to this card as an Equip Spell Card(s) with this effect.‚óèThe equipped monster gains 200 ATK.

card.name: Drill Bug
card.description: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can select 1 "Parasite Paracide" card from your Deck, shuffle the Deck, and place "Parasite Paracide" on top of the Deck.

card.name: Deepsea Warrior
card.description: As long as "Umi" is face-up on the field, this card is unaffected by any Spell Cards.

card.name: Bite Shoes
card.description: FLIP: Change the Attack or Defense Position of 1 face-up monster on the field. The card must remain face-up.

card.name: Spikebot
card.description: A mechanical soldier created by a wicked sorcerer, it attacks with the two steel balls attached to its arms.

card.name: Invitation to a Dark Sleep
card.description: When this monster is summoned (excluding Special Summon), select 1 of your opponent's monsters. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the selected monster cannot attack.

card.name: Thousand-Eyes Idol
card.description: A wicked entity that controls the hearts of men, its thousand eyes are able to see and expand the negative influences in an individual's soul.

card.name: Thousand-Eyes Restrict
card.description: "Relinquished" + "Thousand-Eyes Idol"Other monsters on the field cannot change their battle positions or attack. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 1). This card's ATK/DEF become equal to that equipped monster's. If this card would be destroyed by battle, destroy that equipped monster instead.

card.name: Girochin Kuwagata
card.description: Despite its small size, this monster has powerful jaws that can rip metal to shreds.

card.name: Hayabusa Knight
card.description: This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.

card.name: Bombardment Beetle
card.description: FLIP: Pick up and see 1 face-down Defense Position Monster Card on your opponent's side of the field. If it is an Effect Monster, destroy it (its Flip Effect is not activated), and if the card is not, return it to its original position.

card.name: 4-Starred Ladybug of Doom
card.description: FLIP: Destroy all Level 4 monsters your opponent controls.

card.name: Gradius
card.description: A high-performance jet fighter with power capsules for variable attack capabilities.

card.name: Vampire Baby (Updated from: Red-Moon Baby)
card.description: At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle and sent it to the Graveyard this turn: You can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field.NoteCard Name updated from "Red-Moon Baby" on July 01, 2013.

card.name: Mad Sword Beast
card.description: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

card.name: Skull Mariner
card.description: A pirate ship that appears out of the mist and sinks any seagoing vessels.

card.name: The All-Seeing White Tiger
card.description: A proud ruler of the jungle that some fear and others respect.

card.name: Goblin Attack Force
card.description: If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase, and its battle position cannot be changed until the End Phase of your next turn.

card.name: Island Turtle
card.description: A huge turtle that is often mistaken for an island.

card.name: Wingweaver
card.description: A six-winged fairy who prays for peace and hope.

card.name: Science Soldier
card.description: Soldiers equipped with state-of-the-art weaponry to face unknown creatures.

card.name: Souls of the Forgotten
card.description: A wicked spirit created by the hateful souls of those who fell in battle. It grows by assimilating the souls of its enemies.

card.name: Dokuroyaiba
card.description: A boomerang with brains that will pursue a target to the ends of the earth.

card.name: The Fiend Megacyber
card.description: If your opponent controls at least 2 more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

card.name: Gearfried the Iron Knight
card.description: If either player equips an Equip Card(s) to this card: Destroy that Equip Card(s).

card.name: Insect Barrier
card.description: Insect-Type monsters your opponent controls cannot declare an attack.

card.name: Beast of Talwar
card.description: Only the master of the sword among Fiend-Type monsters is permitted to hold the Talwar.(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)

card.name: Imperial Order
card.description: Negate all Spell effects on the field. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, you must pay 700 LP (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed.
